title.narrative: Environmental cooperation instruments in the context of inclusive and sustainable industrial development [ISID]

description.narrative: This project will examine economic cooperation instruments and their environmental impact among Asian countries and assess the potential support that UNIDO, with its multilateral character and mandate to promote and accelerate inclusive and sustainable industrial development [ISID], could provide support to this effort of assuring a resource effective industrial development for sustainable societies in the region. The project arises at a time when the Asia region is experiencing unprecedented rapid development with extreme pressure on natural r esources and environmental goods including water, soil and air quality. Economic cooperation in the region is generally bilateral in nature where recipient countries are tied to buy goods and services from donor countries. This may result in sub-optimal solutions and contrasts with multilateral cooperation where inter-country aid can be more balanced than when left to the donor#s self-interest and where the process can be governed by development criteria.
